Question: WastewaterTankXL?
Constraint/Rule: if (WastewaterTankXL) { FilterTank = FilterTankXL } if (WastewaterTankXL) { FreshwaterTankType = FreshwaterTankXL }

Question: WastewaterTankXLModule?
Constraint/Rule: if (WastewaterTankXLModule) { WastewaterTankXL = true } if (WastewaterTankXLModule) { Valve2 = true } if (WastewaterTankXLModule) { FilterTankModule = FilterTankXLModule } if (WastewaterTankXLModule) { FreshwaterTankModule = FreshwaterTankXLModule }

Question: FreshwaterTankType?
Constraint/Rule: if (FreshwaterTankType.FreshwaterTankS || FreshwaterTankType.FreshwaterTankXL) { FreshwaterTank = true } if (FreshwaterTankType.FreshwaterTankS) { disallow(Mount.Rack2) } if (FreshwaterTankType.FreshwaterTankXL) { FilterTank = FilterTankXL } if (FreshwaterTankType.FreshwaterTankXL) { WastewaterTankXL = true }

Question: FreshwaterTankModule?
Constraint/Rule: if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankXLModule) { Valve1 = true } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankXLModule) { Mount = Rack2 } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankXLModule) { Tube3 = true } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankSModule) { FreshwaterTankType = FreshwaterTankS } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankSModule) { Valve1 = true } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankSModule) { Tube3 = false } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankSModule) { Valve2 = false } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankXLModule) { FilterTankModule = FilterTankXLModule } if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankXLModule) { WastewaterTankXL = true }

Question: FilterTankModule?
Constraint/Rule: if (FilterTankModule.FilterTankXLModule) { FilterTank = FilterTankXL } if (FilterTankModule.FilterTankSModule) { FilterTank = FilterTankS } if (FilterTankModule.FilterTankXLModule) { FreshwaterTankModule = FreshwaterTankXLModule } if (FilterTankModule.FilterTankXLModule) { WastewaterTankXLModule = true }

Question: FilterTankXLModule?
Constraint/Rule: if (FilterTankXLModule.CAFilterTankXLModule) { FilterTank = FilterTankXL } if (FilterTankXLModule.CAFilterTankXLModule) { CharcoalType = CharcoalActive } if (FilterTankXLModule.CBFilterTankXLModule) { FilterTank = FilterTankXL } if (FilterTankXLModule.CBFilterTankXLModule) { CharcoalType = CharcoalBone }

Question: FilterTankSModule?
Constraint/Rule: if (FilterTankSModule.CAFilterTankSModule) { FilterTank = FilterTankS } if (FilterTankSModule.CAFilterTankSModule) { CharcoalType = CharcoalActive } if (FilterTankSModule.CBFilterTankSModule) { FilterTank = FilterTankS } if (FilterTankSModule.CBFilterTankSModule) { CharcoalType = CharcoalBone }

Question: FilterTank?
Constraint/Rule: if (FilterTank.FilterTankXL) { FreshwaterTankType = FreshwaterTankXL } if (FilterTank.FilterTankXL) { WastewaterTankXL = true }
